name: Rupee Drop
description: Triggers a drop of Force Gems or enemies under specific conditions.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor.

fields.name: Drop Amount
fields.description: The amount that is dropped. Or Default if 0.

fields.name: Size
fields.description: The diameter in parts where objects are dropped. Or Default(8) if 0.

fields.name: Drop Pattern
fields.description: Determines how the Force Gems or enemies will be dropped.

0.name: Force Screen
0.description: Drops Force Gems across the screen.

2.name: Bomb Circle
2.description: Drops bombs in a circular pattern.

3.name: Force Screen (Immediate Drop)
3.description: Drops Force Gems across the screen immediately.

4.name: Green Soldier Circle
4.description: Spawns a circle of Green Soldiers.

5.name: Popo Screen
5.description: Spawns Popo enemies while dropping Force Gems.

6.name: Force Square
6.description: Drops Force Gems in a square formation.

7.name: Force Like Square
7.description: Drops Force Gems and spawns a Force Like-Like.

9.name: Stalfos Circle
9.description: Spawns a circle of Stalfos enemies.

11.name: Rope Square
11.description: Spawns a square formation of Rope enemies.

12.name: Force Square (Fast Despawn)
12.description: Drops Force Gems immediately in a square but despawns quickly.

13.name: Rope Square (No SE)
13.description: Spawns Rope enemies in a square formation without sound effects.
